name: Oh!
description:
Please Play in Fullscreen.

Oh! is a magic drawing app for kids.

Made for tablet but playable online in Fullscreen mode.

The drawings are from Anouck Boisrobert. In fact the whole game design is from a pop-up book we made, called "That's my hat" ("Oh ! mon chapeau" in French). More info : http://ludocube.fr/oh

I'll be happy to have your comments, advices for next steps...
and since it's free, don't hesitate to rate / comment our app on stores to help us ;)
